objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#111111'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#2a2a2a'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='bg2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#cc0000'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#ff0000'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg1)'/><path d='M1080 0 L500 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='url(#bg2)'/><g opacity='0.08'><circle cx='150' cy='150' r='40' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='150' cy='250' r='20' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='30' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='270' cy='150' r='25' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='40' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='950' cy='800' r='20' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='850' cy='850' r='30' fill='#ffffff'/><circle cx='950' cy='950' r='25' fill='#ffffff'/></g><g opacity='0.05'><path d='M0 300 L300 0' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 600 L600 0' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M0 900 L900 0' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M200 1080 L1080 200' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M500 1080 L1080 500' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M800 1080 L1080 800' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
Active Noise Cancellation
Up to 24 Hours Battery Life
High-Quality Built-in Microphone
IPX4 Sweat & Water Resistant

product_details.description: Custom acoustic platform delivers powerful, balanced sound Control your sound with two distinct listening modes: Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) and Transparency mode Three soft ear tip sizes for a stable and comfortable fit while ensuring an optimum acoustic seal Up to 8 hours of listening time (up to 24 hours combined with pocket-sized charging case) Industry-leading Class 1 Bluetooth for extended range and fewer dropouts High-quality call performance and voice assistant interaction via built-in microphones IPX4-rated sweat- and water-resistant wireless earbuds Beats wireless headphones and earphones are compatible with Apple and Android devices What’s in the box – Beats Studio Buds true wireless noise cancelling earphones, charging case, ear tips with three size options, USB-C to USB-C charging cable, Quick Start Guide, warranty card (USB-C power adapter sold separately) Brand - Beats ** Color - Black ** Ear Placement - In Ear ** Form Factor - In Ear, True Wireless ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation, Sound Isolation **

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern, tech-savvy aesthetic designed to showcase a premium audio product. The layout is structured with a dark diagonal gradient background, transitioning from charcoal gray to black, intersected by a bold red accent triangle to create visual energy. The main headline (`heading_1`) is rendered in large white uppercase type, followed below by a vibrant red subheading (`heading_2`) that emphasizes the product name. A smaller, muted gray subtitle (`subheading`) introduces the technical category. Supporting features are detailed in a stacked list (`description`) set in clean white text. A large, prominent price (`price`) in bold white typography draws immediate attention below the details. The call-to-action (`cta_button` and `cta`) is a striking red rectangle labeled in white, encouraging immediate engagement. Prominently featured is a realistic product image (`product_image`) on the right, overlapping both the black and red portions for depth and contrast.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #111111
- Charcoal Gray: #2a2a2a
- Crimson Red: #ff0000
- Soft Gray: #cccccc
- Pure White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image showcases matte black wireless earbuds with a sleek, modern design. The dominant color is deep matte black (#0A0A0A), conveying sophistication and elegance. Highlights and subtle reflections use shades of graphite gray (#2E2E2E) and charcoal (#1C1C1C), creating a sense of depth and form through soft gradients. The iconic "b" logo on both the buds and case stands out in a light silver-gray (#DADADA), adding brand visibility and contrast. A faint LED indicator uses a cool icy blue (#E1F0FF), introducing a subtle accent. This monochromatic palette allows for powerful visual focus while offering versatility for a high-end tech advertisement banner.
